title: Healing Life Through Camping In Another World
summary: Star chef Ganghyeon Lee, who has lost his sense of taste, retreats to a peaceful countryside to escape the public eye. In his grandfather's rural home, he stumbles upon a portal to another world. Taking advantage of his escape, he decides to enjoy a relaxed camping life in this new world. However, the inhabitants of this world keep showing interest in him. Will Ganghyeon be able to live a peaceful life?

title: What a Bountiful Harvest, Demon Lord!
summary:
I've become the Demon Lord, the final boss in a game, but...

If I invade the human world? I'll be slain by the max-level protagonist I raised.

If I stop the invasion? I'll be devoured by my starving demon generals.

...Therefore, the only answer is farming.

title: Ice Lord
summary: At the young age of twenty, Seol Mudok, a master swordsman, became the Lord of the Northern Sea Ice Palace. Plunged into despair after the death of his lover, he discovers that with the legendary flower, the “Lotus of Love,” that his deceased lover has been reincarnated. In his quest, he descends into another world…

title: My Inventory is Abnormal
summary: Yuujun Shin, a wealthy crypto investor, spends his time mastering a little-known game and purchasing all the best perks to dominate. When the game unexpectedly merges with reality, Yuujun finds himself in the game world with access to his massive virtual inventory. Now, with his amassed power and resources, he is more than ready to navigate this new reality...or is he?

title: I Quit the Hero’s Party
summary: Youki was reincarnated in another world. However, instead of being reincarnated as the hero or the demon lord, he was instead reincarnated half-assedly as a minion of the Demon Lord. One day, the Hero's Party attacked the Demon Lord's castle with the intent of defeating the Demon Lord. Of course, Youki was able to repel their attempt with ease. In spite of this, he ended up falling for the cleric, Cecilia, at first sight...

title: Kalli the Champion
summary:
After giving up his dream as a boxer, Park Kang-tae joined a gang. He was well-known inside the gang but got killed in the end. He had one regret when he died - giving up his dream as a boxer.

Did God know about his regret? In a world, where boxing exists in the form of pugilist games, Park Kang-tae pursues his unfulfilled dream.

title: Kneel, Your Grace!
summary: Everyone has had the urge to punch their infuriating boss, but actually going through with it is hard. Especially when that boss is a war hero and a grand duke, no less. Chloe could only grit her teeth as she watched Curtis constantly conduct service inspections… but then, a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity presented itself. The king ordered Curtis to marry a noblewoman from another country, and he put forward his lieutenant, Chloe, as his lover. Now, the gun was in her hands… “First, get on your knees, Your Grace.”

title: I Became A Part Time Employee For Gods
summary:
Devoid of professional skills, unemployed Yu Damduk was forced to take a part-time job. Frustrated with his pathetic life, he vents to the gods, gets stricken by lightning and passes out.
[Hiring] God is waiting for you.
When he wakes up, he finds a status window floating before his eyes.
Since I have nothing to lose anyway, let’s go with the flow…
Jumping into God’s Part-time world to have a better life, the adventure of Yu Damduk, who became the lowest-class God in the part-time world, begins!

title: The Psycho Duke and I
summary: Reincarnated from Earth into a world of magic and tradition, Joshua, the son of a duke, is exiled to a barren frontier after the saintess declares he is not following the oracle’s prophecy. Hoping to live a quiet and uneventful life, his plans are upended when the people from his former dukedom abandon their lands to follow him, insisting he remains their true lord. Reluctantly, Joshua takes on the task of transforming the wasteland into a thriving home for his followers, vowing to complete the work in three years so he can finally enjoy the peaceful life he longs for.

title: I was Reborn as a Housekeeper in a Parallel World!
The Bondservant
summary: When a near-accident involving her father and a servant boy brings a new face into the Evegenjya home, the last thing Sioanna is expecting is for a new servant in her ranks, let alone a friend. Étienne has learned the hard way to be quiet and reserved, but as his relationship with Sioanna blooms, the two begin to form a bond of affection, care...and obsession. Despite the deep hurt in both their lives, their ability to treat one another with gentleness and kindness proves to be just the remedy they both needed. But will it be enough to conquer the countless obstacles that stand in their way?

title: Miss Pendleton
summary: If love is the ultimate prize, then the perils of courtship are the necessary trials and tribulations one must endure in its pursuit. It is a blessing for the society debutantes of London, then, that Cupid’s arrow should be guided by the dainty hand of Miss Laura Pendleton, granddaughter of Countess Pendleton and the city’s finest matchmaker. When Laura’s self-ascribed duties call her to befriend the stoic and saturnine Mr. Ian Dalton of Whitefield, however, she soon finds that when it comes to the grand contest of love, it may well be every woman for herself…

title: The End of an Imperfect Divorce
The Heat of the Reincarnated Villainess
summary:
Konoha Satou has a dark history, written throughout middle school-a fantasy adventure of love and magic about the Count's daughter Konoha Magnolia and the knights who love her! But when it looks like that dark history is going to be uncovered by her mother, Konoha panics and dies in a traffic accident! Opening her eyes, she finds that she's been reincarnated into the world of her own dark history as Iana Magnolia, the worst villainess of her own creation!  
  
Ghost-seeing School Boys oneshot included in volume 1 as chapter 3.5.

title: I’m an Extra Who’s Trying to Run Away from the Obsessive Male Lead
I’m a Villainess Devoted to My Favorite Character, So What?
You Can Hear It
summary: Ryouran High School is a private arts academy where geniuses in every field—music, dance, fashion—gather. But in reality, looks decide the students' success, not talent. My sister, Shiika Ikebukuro, is a shut-in who can't do anything without her older brother, and I was sure that devastating lack of charisma would doom her. But I know a secret. Though you'd never guess it, behind her mask, the internet sensation VSINGER is none other than my sister, Shiika! Her voice is one of a kind, but will it be enough to overcome Ryouran High's entire social order?

title: The Ducal Family’s Poisonous Flower
summary:
Lily Roland, the daughter of Duke Roland, stumbled upon her fiancé and her illegitimate sister having an affair! She was poisoned by the two people whom she grew up with, and thrown into the wilderness.

When her life was hanging by a thread, she was saved by a monstrous creature that had a body of a human, but a head of a beast, who turned out to be the Crown Prince, Isaac Stewart.

Isaac was cursed by a mysterious witch to turn into a bloodthirsty monster on the night when the moon is full, and Lily’s blood is his only antidote!

Isaac decides to help Lily in her revenge, but in exchange, she must marry him and assist him in lifting the curse.

title: Arcane Sniper
summary:
Paraplegic ex-sniper Ha Yiha is getting a fresh start in the VR game “Middle Earth.” He hopes to become a powerful player and earn enough money to afford surgery, but there’s a small problem… an untimely logout leaves him playing as a musketeer, the game’s most ineffective class. Luckily, he’s able to use his real-life sharpshooting skills to take musketeering to new heights. As his unprecedented progress turns heads and prompts new quests, Yiha thinks he’s got a shot at success, but he may have just landed himself directly in danger’s sights.

---

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Freeshooter/548)

title: Twin Moon
summary:
A woman identical to me appears in my dreams, crying.  

"Who are you?"  

For three years, Shunaelle, the Demon King of the North, has been haunted by the same dream, growing curious about the woman and deciding to track her down.  

The truth? She’s a fragment of Shunaelle’s soul, cast away into the human realm.  

When Shunaelle tries to absorb the fragment back into herself, the woman resists.  

『I don’t want to be absorbed!』  

Instead, she makes a plea:  
If you want me back, live my life—a life filled with regret—and make it right.

title: The Beast Won’t Let Me Sleep
summary: No summary available.

title: I’m Doomed if They Become Obsessed
Please Don’t Reply!
summary: Li Ran traversed to another world and became the Holy Son of a Demon Way Sect. The system has awakened, and the first task released is actually to fall in love? The Sect strictly forbids relationships between men and women. Li Ran took the risk of being expelled from the Sect and wrote a love letter to his junior sister, but it was sent to the master by mistake!

title: Outrageous! I opened a training class for empresses
summary: Lu Li, An Ordinary Teacher With Amnesia, Managed To Turn His Three Female Students Into A Queen Of Killers, A Queen Of Medicine, And A Queen Of Business?! It Turns Out His True Identity Is An Ancient Immortal Who Lost His Memory And Fell To The Mortal World. Now That He Has Regained Everything, He Decides To Defy Fate With His Disciples And Reclaim His Former Glory!

title: Nano Machine
summary:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.  

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2171)

title: Everything Changed After I Died
summary:
My funeral has begun.

“How can she not shed tears when her twin sister died?”

“I heard she’s an idiot, so the rumors must be true.”

“I heard she has an inferiority complex. Who knows, maybe she is happy inside.”

I died of poison. And overnight I became Mergen’s burden, Irene.

You said you wanted to live like me? No, Irene. You shouldn’t live like that.

***

“You’re not going anywhere without my permission, Noona.”

Since when did Abel, who treated Irene like a bug, start calling me Noona?

“Keep your promise. Our deal isn’t over yet.”

My ex-fiancé, with whom I had a strictly business relationship, started treating Irene like the old me.

“I don’t care what it is. I’m a vulgar mongrel, unlike you, so I can digest whatever I swallow.”

Why does the Grand Duke, whom I thought was the enemy, do this?

The attitudes of the three men are puzzling. It is said that there are no permanent enemies or allies, but has there ever been a time when things were so unclear as now?

title: Surviving the Inverted World with Omnipotent Skills
summary: The world’s most popular game, AZURE LAND, suddenly ends its service. Soon after, monsters from the game begin appearing in the real world, blurring the line between reality and virtual reality. Shizuya Kakitsubata, the game’s top commander, is caught in the chaos and must now fight to survive. Humanity, once the hunters, have become the hunted—and their survival is uncertain in this new, deadly reality.

title: Necromancer Academy and the Genius Summoner
summary:
Necromancers have built a name for themselves as fearsome practitioners of magic capable of dropping entire empires to their knees. Simon Follentia is a necromancer with incredible latent talent! After being scouted for the necromancer's academy, this genius is ready to be nurtured and taken to the next level. 

But could Simon's insane talents attract some unforeseen consequences?

title: Blood Demon Reincarnation
summary:
Kang San is a bottom-tier anker with neither talent, ability, or skill. Misfortune follows him until a divine messenger appears before him one day. 

"You wee the Blood Demon in your past life." 

To atone for his past life’s sins, he must endure harsh trials. But in return, he will receive immense rewards. 

Can a weak F-rank tanker drenched in blood change his fate?

title: Mr Mo’s Secret
summary: A father who mysteriously disappeared, a mother who killed herself and clues that lie in a web of secrets. To find the truth, I decided to make an unspoken transaction with Mr. Mo, the most powerful man in the city. Who would have thought that a sweet man could be summoned with a kiss! One moment as cold as frost, one moment as hot as a stove, a boyfriend with such duality, I want it all. The quirky girlfriend vs a two-faced catlike tycoon, under the stars, till the end of time, I will only love…

title: Pick Me Up
summary:
1-Star heroes are just fodder for learning a boss' attack patterns.

That was Seojin Han's philosophy when playing the notoriously difficult game Pick Me Up. But after being transported into the game as one of those 1-star heroes, he's got no choice but to rise in rank and defeat the player controlling him and his party.

Can a gacha game character hope to defeat a player akin to being his god?

title: Please Take Care
summary: Help! Why is my blind date my 'ex'-boyfriend?!

title: Reincarnated As the Villain Queen to Get My Revenge
I Became The Male Leads’ Target
summary:
Reincarnated in a ruined reverse harem novel, her sisters marry the male leads while she's left dealing with their overwhelming attention.

---
I reincarnated into a tragic reverse harem novel with no dreams or hopes left, and for some reason, the heroine died. Before I could fully process the shock of the original story being not just broken but erased, my sisters began pairing up with the male leads.

The playful and obsessive emperor fell for my mature and kind eldest sister.

The stoic and strongest swordsman in the world fell for my romance-genius second sister.

The flirtatious genius of the Magic Tower fell for my cynical youngest sister.

Me? I’m only six years old, so having a love line would land me in serious trouble. Anyway, my sisters seemed to get along well with their partners and eventually held weddings. But then...

"Lilliana, call me 'oppa.'"

"I'm your favorite brother-in-law, right?"

"It's an imperial decree. My youngest sister-in-law will live in the palace and be treated like a princess."

I just want to go back to the days when it was just me and my three sisters living together!

title: Return of the Disaster-Class Hero
summary:
Twenty years.

For twenty long years, the thirteenth saint Lee Geon was trapped inside the Tower of Demons after being backstabbed by twelve of his allies. These twelve "saints" were warriors chosen by the twelve Zodiac gods to defeat mysterious monsters called "calamities" that were massacring the planet. Though no god had chosen Geon as a saint, he became the mightiest of them all, which made him a hero... and a target.

But now, Geon has brawled his way out of the tower, and he's back stronger than ever. All that's left is to exact brutal payback on each of the saints, but none of these powerful beings will go down without a fight.

Will Geon be able to stay in one piece while achieving the divine revenge of his dreams?

---

- [Tapas English Translation](https://tapas.io/series/the-return-of-the-disaster-class-hero/info)

title: I Contracted Myself
summary: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

title: Versatile Sword Cultivator
summary: When video games and real life began to merge, Lin Jichen—the best player in the Dao Realm and the top practitioner of "Eight Worlds"—died as a result of the betrayal of his girlfriend and brother. He fiercely refused rules in his new life and embraced the sword, cutting out the future and rewriting his fate with it! It also allows him to ride the game before it is integrated into reality!

title: Sam Plays the Game
summary:
Kosuke found himself in a whole different world. Standing there with the wilderness to the east and a forest to his left, he decided to make good use of the occurrence, and tests his knowledge, to where he finds this amazing crafting ability, just like the games from his original world! ――This is a light for life in a different world. When I thought, I was suddenly attacked by a beautiful dark elf...?!
___
- [Official LN (Eng)](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/survival-in-another-world-with-my-mistress-light-novel/)

title: I, The Demon Lord am being targeted by my female Disciples!
summary: Bai Feng transmigrated into an ancient chinese style dating game and became the Demon Lord, Bai Qingling. The Bai Qingling in the game is cold-hearted and ruthless. In order to seek immortality, he cultivates the Path of Gu, makes human puppets, and does all kinds of evil. What’s even more hateful is that his three stunning female disciples he regards as pawns, are the villain bosses in the game’s “Pure Love” and “Evil Fall” routes! In such a desperate situation, let’s see how Bai Feng can turn the tables with the [Great Love System]!

title: Do All Mothers in Childcare Novels have to Die?
summary:
Reborn as a mother doomed to die in a childcare novel, she fights to change her fate. When trying to escape her tragic destiny, she gets caught by the emperor himself—her future husband! Instead of death, she finds herself at the center of a loving family, but can she defy the trope and survive?

---
Lilliana is a neglected princess with a single mission: do not get pregnant. Ever since she woke up in a novel where she will die giving birth to the main character, Lilliana has known that her pregnancy will be her death sentence. However, her mission’s greatest obstacle is her new husband, Emperor Helio. Although they have married for political reasons, the ruthless emperor's fondness for Lilliana drives him to decide that his mission is to win her over. Thus begins the battle of wills between wife and husband. Will Lilliana be able to defy destiny and Helio’s affections?

title: I’ll Take On This Marriage In This Life
summary:
After a hazy one-night encounter, Sayna found herself married to George. The end of that hellish marriage? Death. But then, she woke up—summoned back by her twin brother Yuri. Now, she’s returned to her youthful days at nineteen, before everything fell apart! Determined to live differently this time, she swore off marriage entirely. That is… until: "I want to be that man for you." Duke Constantine proposes to her?!

---
Adored by her noble family, Saina Devof had a perfect life until one night ruined her societal debut, her family’s honor, and her future in one fell swoop. Determined to fix her mistake, she chooses to marry the man from that night, only to find herself trapped in a nightmare that ended with her lonely death. Then, she woke up. 18 years old again with a second chance at life, Saina swears off marriage for good. But her plans change when he appears:

“I want to be your choice.”

Enter Duke Constantine—the man determined to rewrite her destiny.

title: Friends Shouldn’t Act This Way
summary:
Rien is a transfer student at Arena Academy who wants a peaceful life. The successor of the Lisianthus Duchy fell in love at first sight with her.

Carlson, who has the face of an innocent man, is a genius in magic, who excels in both looks and family background. He only has one flaw.; he always beats up anything that irritates him.

"I like kind men."

Rien's determination with such words, Carlson's gentle face, and even the thought that this relationship will end once they graduate all clouded her mind. However, Rien still can't help but feel attracted to Carlson.

Can this friendship proceed smoothly?
